Name: Auto Framing (Face tracking)
Description: Option to automatically center the camera feed to the recognized face region.

Name: Shortcut to change background
Description: Allow to add a shortcut to change your background to original  remove or one of the replacement backgrounds.

Name: Chroma Key option
Description: Option to select Chroma Key for background removal.

Name: Camera zoom
Description: Option to zoom the camera feed.

Name: Multiple output
Description: Allow to use the virtual camera in multiple applications at the same time.

Name: Watermark library
Description: Allow to add more than one custom watermark.

Name: Resizable window
Description: Option to resize and maximize XSplit VCam window.
